import React,{useContext} from "react" import {PaymentContext} from '../context' let PayByCredit = () =>{ let {paymentData,paymentDispatcher} = useContext(PaymentContext) return ( <>
{ paymentDispatcher({method:'credit'},{email:e.target.value}) console.log('paymentData',paymentData) } } />
- - - VISA
月 / 年
) } export default PayByCredit
